description:
Riku`s slump worsens. It seems like the cause of his poor performance is emotional, not technical, but rather than clashing with Takeru like before, Riku begins to drift away from the team.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: STAND UP そこにお前がいたから
Stand Up : Parce que tu étais là
Stand Up: Because You Were There
Stand Up: Soko ni Omae ga Ita kara
